briefdescription.para: MCO output disabled, no clock on MCO.
Enum representing which clock is to be outputted to the Master Clock Output (MCO) pin.
Enum representing a prescaler choice for the MCO output.
The MSI clock is to be activated or desactivated.
The LSE clock is to be activated or desactivated.
The HSI clock is to be activated or desactivated.
The HSE clock is to be activated or desactivated.
The PLL clock is to be activated or desactivated.
The PLLSAI1 clock is to be activated or desactivated.
The PLLSAI2 clock is to be activated or desactivated.
Enum representing a choice of clock for activating and desactivating.
The source clock for the PLL is not selected.
The source clock for the PLL is MSI.
The source clock for the PLL is HSI16.
The source clock for the PLL is HSE.
Enum representing a choice of clock as source for PLL.
Enum representing choices for the PLL_R parameter.
Indicates that a function has returned successfully.
Indicates that a function has been given invalid (out of range) arguments.
Indicates that a general error has occured.
Enum representing the status of a function.
Enum representing clocks which can be chosen as the system clock.
Enum representing different values for the AHB prescaler.
Enum representing different values for the APB1 prescaler.
Enum representing different values for the APB1 prescaler.

memberdef.argsstring: (GPIO_Port port, uint8_t pin, CLOCK_MCO_SELECT_State mco_sel_state, CLOCK_MCO_PRESCALER_State mco_pre_state)
memberdef.name: CLOCK_activateMCO

briefdescription.para: Activates the Master Clock Output pin to the selected output state.

parameterdescription.para: pin number of the MCO pin.
which clock should be outputed to MCO.
prescaler for the MCO (divisions by powers of 2 up to 16 allowed).

simplesect.para: Untested function due to lack of proper oscilloscope.
Desired clock (mco_sel_state) needs to be properly activated via the RCC_CR register before use of this function. By default SYSCLK is already activated.

memberdef.argsstring: (CLOCK_PLL_SOURCE_State pll_src, uint8_t PLL_M, uint8_t PLL_N, CLOCK_PLLR_State PLL_R)
memberdef.name: CLOCK_configPLL

briefdescription.para: Configures the PLL clock so that it may be used as the System clock.

parameterdescription.para: selects which clock will drive the PLL
divsion factor for the main PLL clock. 1 <= PLL_M <= 16.
divsion factor for the main PLL clock. PLLR = {2, 4, 6, 8}.

simplesect.para: This function can only be called if the PLL clock is disabled. Use CLOCK_isActivated() and CLOCK_desactivateClk() before calling this function.

briefdescription.para: Checks if a clock is activated or not by reading from RCC control registers.

simplesect.para: This function does not check correctness of arguments. This responsibility is given to the caller.
Blocking function. Will only return once a 'RDY' flag has been raised by the clock hardware (clock stabilized).
For the PLL clock, it is necessary to call CLOCK_configPLL() first before calling this function.

briefdescription.para: Gets the speed (frequency) in Hz of the PLL clock, if it is activated.

simplesect.para: frequency of PLL clock in Hz. If return value is 0, then PLL is not activated or has invalid PLL_N, PLL_M or PLL_R constants.

briefdescription.para: Gets the speed (frequency) in Hz of the MSI (Multi-Speed Internal) clock.

simplesect.para: frequency of MSI clock in Hz.

briefdescription.para: Set the speed of the external clock oscillator, if one is available.
Gets the speed (frequency) in Hz of the HSE (High-Speed External) clock.

simplesect.para: frequency of HSE clock in Hz.

briefdescription.para: Gets the speed (frequency) in Hz of the system clock.

detaileddescription.para:
The system clock can either be: MSI, HSI16, HSE or PLL.
frequency of the system clock in Hz.

parameterdescription.para: The system clock to be selected

simplesect.para: This function assumes that the clock has already been activated via CLOCK_activateClk().
Blocking function. Will only return once a SWS flag has been set by hardware in the RCC_CFGR register.

briefdescription.para: Set the AHB prescaler for the AHB clock (HCLK).

detaileddescription.para:
This clocks feeds the AHB1 and AHB2 buses.
ahb_prescaler
choice for the AHB_PRE value.
status

briefdescription.para: Set the APB1 prescaler for the APB1 clock (PCLK1).

detaileddescription.para:
This clocks feeds the AHB1 and AHB2 buses.
apb1_prescaler
choice for the APB1_PRE value.
status

briefdescription.para: Set the APB2 prescaler for the APB2 clock (PCLK2).

detaileddescription.para:
This clocks feeds the AHB1 and AHB2 buses.
apb2_prescaler
choice for the APB2_PRE value.
status
